io.sphere.sdk.http

Interface ApacheHttpClientAdapter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, HttpClient

    public interface ApacheHttpClientAdapter
extends HttpClient
    Adapter to use a CloseableHttpAsyncClient as HttpClient. For more information about HttpComponents AsyncClient use their webpage.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods
